verses.text: \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* ye \w what|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* saith: \w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, \w contend|strong="H7378"\w* thou \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w judgment|strong="H0834"\w* \w against|strong="H0854"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w hills|strong="H1389"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* thy \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*.

Let \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w judgment|strong="H3198"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* strong \w foundations|strong="H4146"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* enter \w into|strong="H0776"\w* \w judgment|strong="H3198"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w plead|strong="H3198"\w* \w against|strong="H5973"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w O|strong="H4100"\w* \w my|strong="H4100"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w what|strong="H4100"\w* have \w I|strong="H4100"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H4100"\w* thee, \w or|strong="H6213"\w* \w in|strong="H3811"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* have \w I|strong="H4100"\w* molested thee? \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* thou \w me|strong="H4100"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w brought|strong="H5927"\w* thee \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5927"\w* thee \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w slaves|strong="H5650"\w*: \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* Mary.

\w O|strong="H4994"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w remember|strong="H2142"\w*, \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w pray|strong="H4994"\w* thee, \w what|strong="H4100"\w* Balach \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w purposed|strong="H3289"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Beor|strong="H1160"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*, \w from|strong="H4480"\w* Setim \w to|strong="H5704"\w* Galgal, \w that|strong="H3045"\w* thou mightest \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* justices \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H8141"\w* offer \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* worthy? wherewith \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H8141"\w* kneel \w before|strong="H6923"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w high|strong="H4791"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*? \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H8141"\w* offer holocausts unto \w him|strong="H0430"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w calves|strong="H5695"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w*?

\w May|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* appeased \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w thousands|strong="H0505"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*, \w or|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* many \w thousands|strong="H0505"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* fat \w he|strong="H3068"\w* goats? \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* wickedness, \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w body|strong="H0990"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*?

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* shew thee, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* requireth \w of|strong="H0430"\w* thee: Verily, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w love|strong="H0160"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* walk solicitous \w with|strong="H5973"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w The|strong="H8085"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* crieth \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* salvation \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H8034"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H7121"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*: \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* ye \w tribes|strong="H4294"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* approve \w it|strong="H7121"\w*?

\w As|strong="H1004"\w* \w yet|strong="H5750"\w* there \w is|strong="H7563"\w* \w a|strong="H5750"\w* fire \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5750"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5750"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, \w the|strong="H5750"\w* \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* iniquity, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w a|strong="H5750"\w* scant \w measure|strong="H0374"\w* full \w of|strong="H1004"\w* wrath.

\w Shall|strong="H0068"\w* \w I|strong="H2135"\w* \w justify|strong="H2135"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7562"\w* \w balances|strong="H3976"\w*, \w and|strong="H0068"\w* the \w deceitful|strong="H4820"\w* \w weights|strong="H0068"\w* \w of|strong="H0068"\w* the \w bag|strong="H3599"\w*?

\w By|strong="H3427"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w her|strong="H4390"\w* \w rich|strong="H6223"\w* \w men|strong="H6223"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* iniquity, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* thereof \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w lies|strong="H8267"\w*, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w their|strong="H4390"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w deceitful|strong="H8267"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w their|strong="H4390"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*.

\w And|strong="H8074"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w therefore|strong="H1571"\w* began \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w strike|strong="H5221"\w* thee \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w desolation|strong="H8074"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w sins|strong="H2403"\w*.

Thou shalt \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w filled|strong="H7646"\w*: \w and|strong="H0398"\w* thy humiliation \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H7130"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H7130"\w* thee: \w and|strong="H0398"\w* thou shalt \w take|strong="H5414"\w* \w hold|strong="H5414"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* save: \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w those|strong="H0834"\w* \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* thou shalt save, \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

Thou shalt \w sow|strong="H2232"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w reap|strong="H7114"\w*: thou shalt \w tread|strong="H1869"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w olives|strong="H2132"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* anointed \w with|strong="H8081"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*: \w and|strong="H8081"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w new|strong="H8492"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*.

\w For|strong="H4616"\w* thou hast \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Amri, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w works|strong="H4639"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Achab: \w and|strong="H1004"\w* thou hast walked according \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* wills, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w should|strong="H8104"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w desolation|strong="H8047"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* thereof \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w hissing|strong="H8322"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.
